name: Walcum tu Kurger Bing
description:
So, one day I thought, "wow, it would be really dumb if someone made  a game where you work as a fast food employee." So, naturally, I made a game where you work as a fast food employee!

Serve the various customers in the bootleg communist Kurger Bing while questioning your life choices, make hard decisions that may result in you getting fired, and pray to God that it'll all be over soon
